description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

Major Features

    (SLIDESNET-31307) - SmartArt: support loading, saving, editing, and 2d-rendering SmartArt objects

Minor Features

    (SLIDESNET-34344) - Write capability for linked OLE objects in PPTX presentations
    (SLIDESNET-33982) - Support for MultiLevelCategoryAxisLabels in Aspose.Slides
    (SLIDESNET-33457) - Setting default zoom size for presentation when it will open in PowerPoint

Other Improvements and Changes

    (SLIDESNET-34862) - Include Dashboards with the Product release
    (SLIDESNET-34859) - Add Online EULA Button in MSI installer
    (SLIDESNET-34850) - Write XML comments for FillTypeEx and its members.

Bugs

    (SLIDESNET-34877) - Text color inside the shapes is changed after PPT is converted to PPTX
    (SLIDESNET-34867) - Hyperlink is lost when PPTX presentation is exported to PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34866) - AutoShape hyperlinks are lost during PPT to PPTX conversion
    (SLIDESNET-34832) - Images are lost after saving presentation
    (SLIDESNET-34767) - Notes are not proper after copying
    (SLIDESNET-34670) - Font substitution works differently for PDF and Thumbnail
    (SLIDESNET-34656) - Series marker symbols get disappered when Aspose.Slides generated presenation opened in Slide show
    (SLIDESNET-34471) - Hyperlink is lost on text in generated HTML
    (SLIDESNET-34470) - Hyperlink on image is lost is generated PDF and HTML
    (SLIDESNET-34464) - Text improperly rendered in generated PDF
    (SLIDESNET-33404) - SmartArt text renders upside down
    (SLIDESNET-33286) - Merging Cells causes extra column to appear in 2.8.2 PPT
    (SLIDESNET-33195) - Setting the SmartArt background color does not work
    (SLIDESNET-33183) - Horizontal Text rendered as vertical and vertical text rendered as horizontal for SmartArt

Exceptions

    (SLIDESNET-34382) - OutOfMemoryException on exporting PPT to PDF
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
